Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: cum \cum\ (k[u^]m; k[oo^]m), prep. [L. with prep.] with; together with; along with; as, I work at home in an office-cum-bedroom. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: cum \cum\ (k[u^]m), n. same as {semen[2]}; -- also spelled {come}. [vulgar slang] [PJC] ||
cum n : the thick white fluid containing spermatozoa that is ejaculated by the male genital tract [syn: {semen}, {seed}, {seminal fluid}, {ejaculate}]
